title: What group moved into the old fraternity house at 5004 Wrightsville Ave.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&rlz=1W1SUNA_en&um=1&ie=UTF-8&q=5004+Wrightsville+Ave.+wilmington+n.c.&fb=1&split=1&gl=us&cid=0,0,6166757508864135125&ei=S7mJSuPgDM-hlAeW952hCw&sa=X&oi=local_result&ct=image&resnum=1



If this is an old listing, UNCW campus housing will have an updated
list for which groups move in during the new semester.



Thanks for using MyReporter.com.
